abstractText: Catch per unit effort (CPUE; see method ID 4040 for example) and the proportion of positive efforts (Ep; proportion of all sets that capture at least one individual, e.g., age-0 white sturgeon)can be useful descriptors of the relative density of fish populations;Uphoff1993;Counihanet al. 1999). In sparsely populated, widely distributed populations,Epmay provide a less biased measure of relative density thanCPUE(Counihanet al. 1999).
title: Calculation of the Proportion of Positive Sets (Ep) v1.0
